comments.body: you should be able to hang a rope ladder from one that is touching a block. This would mean unnecessary blocks will not be needed.
don't think they would allow us to tame them but cool idea
The sniffer could find them!

It may be pushing it to add a wither mob head since the wither skeleton head already exists, but I agree that the wither has one of the best sound banks. Maybe the wither skeleton head makes the wither sounds instead of the current wither skeleton noises, especially since its sound bank is really quite similar to the skeleton.

One other problem I find with the Warden and Wither heads is they would be near impossible to kill with a charged creeper. They would have to be found in some sort of structure (like the Ender dragon head). The Warden head would be too big to fit on a singular block to the point that the sides of the head hang off the block as can be seen here:https://www.planetminecraft.com/data-pack/warden-head-drop/

Every other mob head is to scale, so the warden head would either have to either be an exception or go off the block. Other than those two discrepancies I love this idea, and would add that since all three illager(except witch) mobs have the same head texture, the pillager head would drop from all illagers(except witch) and would be called an "illager head"

(oh and the enderman head could maybe open into its angry variant when powered by redstone)
Maybe add zombie piglin head?

It is better to carve such a chest (or rather a coffin) from a solid non-fragile igneous rock, like granite.
A characteristic feature of any slate is its layers into which it breaks up, something solid cannot be hollowed out of it. These layers can be used as joining plates, but how do you hold them together? Joiner's connections?
Идея очень интересная...
料理機能を拡張したほうがいいと思う
New plants for new dye colors, a plant armor, and some sort of plant grappling hook that uses vines.
A new crop would be cool like maybe corn?
Wagons would be a great idea
La verdad seria una muy buena actualización porque no podemos hacer nada con la esmeralda y que durará como el hierro sumado con la espada de oro la armadura y los items
Yo opino que la idea está bien y también se pudieran hacer artículos y armadura de cobre y que durará como el hierro y diamante sería una buena idea la verdad
Sería increíble más por qué sería un reto podría reemplazar la cota de malla y en mi opinión proteger más que la de diamante pero menos que la de netherita

Essa ideia é magnífica, mas a mojang não nós da oque pedimos, pelo menos adicionar a armadura se ela nos ouvisse o Minecraft seria Perfeito, talvez o jogo mais jogado do mundo ultrapassando roblox, mas como os Criadores de conteúdos do roblox nós escutam, a realidade essa, então mojang trate de nós dar esses itens de esmeralda
golem de esmeralda

Since the archaeology feature doesn't feel fully developed yet, I like the idea of including some ancient copper - maybe even for a bit of extra lore. But as fitting as it seems, I think that copper armour with "unique abilities" is not suitable for vanilla.
Copper Ankhs? Because pyramids?
Maybe use a campfire instead, to keep the crops warm? New use for camfires

i think it would add some physics to Minecraft by making winter kill crops. which would be super cool. the plants could slowly wilt if you didn't pick them by time and slowly frost in the winter! but with winter that means that you would have to add all the other seasons too. summer, fall, winter, and spring. which would be so fun. each season would have an effect on each biome and maybe some new blocks to fit with each season! thanks for reading!

or covered under a solid or glass block? greenhouse is hard to code.

add winter as a weather

some crops like torch flowers, punkins and beatroots can surive
i guess we should encorage players to harvest their crops by using winter destroys farmland
I think that campfires should be able to protect crops from cold, but crops will be grown slowly compared to warm biomes and greenhouses.

First of all, winter doesn’t exist in Minecraft. If by winter, you mean in the real world, it can be a very long period of time people can’t grow crops without having to build a whole greenhouse. It doesn’t really fit the style of the game. I just think that it should just slow down the growth process and possibly kill some crops, not ruin your chances of growing until the season changes.
yay

its a great idea and wood be cute to give to ur friend
This would be especially fun of more petal colours get added down the line too, new flowers crowns! I think it might be cute if it reduced the hostility of zombies when you wear it too.

Another option would be to add more Fungi "woods" especially to get some of the more usual colors, which could have some in the End (more fireproof material) and the End (creeper and ghast explosion proof maybe?) Even could add in another cave biome with glowing fungi that occur between -40 to -64
It's a good idea. Like terracotta blocks, each type of wood will look different with the stain mixture. Since more blocks can be added (1.13+), this is something that can be done perfectly well.
u can do that with packs if u rlly want them fyi
Aren’t they on bedrock all ready
There is a summon command for enabling arms in Java, but it would be better to just have an interface to toggle it more easily.
Armor stands have arms on Bedrock but not Java. I play bedrock more so its odd to play java and see armor stands without arms.
They're on Bedrock, but they'd be really nice to have on Java as well without mods.
Armor Stand Equality

I do not know why no one has responded to this post yet, but it seems to me that it would be just fine to see a set of copper armor and tools in the game. Also make them an oxidation system. For example, the more the tool / armor is oxidized, the less durability it has, but the better it will be enchanted. Oxidation can be removed in at least 2 ways, either by putting an oxidized object with an axe in a workbench, or a lightning bolt will strike the armor stand with armor and the armor will oxidize. To use copper equipment, you can give it the level of tools like iron, and the durability is slightly less. In any case, even if these concepts do not get into the game, it would be very nice to get new applications of copper.

 

(made with translator)
Mojang said they will not add Copper gear to make it different from other materials.
Gfh
I agree that copper needs more uses. I'm not sure the look of a copper chestplate or helemet, or so on would look that good though. I suggest implementing more uses for copper in some other way.
Agreed! I don't know why they made it so there is so much copper since there isn't much to make out of it. Maybe getting ready for a future update I hope?
Great idea, i know a similar idea to this, where you would have a copper wrench that could move a block and move it in all directions, it would be great for building
I believe we should be able to place ANY item as a block.
ladders?
Let's just make it possible to stand (like scaffolding) and hang with existing ladders in the game, not add new ones
you mean like ROPE LADDERS.

Bamboo is weaker than wood in real life so this does not make sense. Even using it too make normal wood tools is overpowered as bamboo is a thousand times more abundant and easier to collect. And the point of a bamboo set is to make a new stylized wood to fit other people's cultures, it may have the same uses as other woods but it looks significantly different.

Why? If you want something better than wood, use stone. Bamboo Wood doesn't need some special tool set, that would be pointless, and inconsistent with every other wood set. Wood makes wood tools... simple as that. Bamboo is no different.
Bamboo is just wood tho
Bamboo is wood
This would be good for villagers but monsters like zombies would he even more annoying with this feature
Not sure how that would work if any mob can get on.
Already outclassing horses... why not boats as well? :/
This would be a good substitute for chests on camels, since we know we won't be getting that.
wait, so you put a sculk block in the crafting table and it will give you a petrol-like color? is that how it works?

Petrol seems a little too similar to what the cyan wool is like though... maybe if it was specifically a darker shade... but I think a less green blue would fit the Sculk better, since only the lighter glowing parts are cyan colored.

I would love to see more dye colors. Dark Red (Mahogany), Dark Blue (Navy Blue/Indigo), Tan, and Light Purple (Purpur)
Isn’t that power

maybe the recipe should instead be 1x3 bamboo
Thant's not true if you're not talking about the bamboo wood but rather pure bamboo

1x3 plank recipe is the slab recipe.

The rafts can only be made of bamboo planks.
1x3 bamboo with a wooden shovel, or 2x3 bamboo with a shovel.
If they add the shovel to the recipe, all boat recipes should have shovels too.
I'm not sure how anyone could complain about having to add a shovel into the boat recipe. It's ONE more log!..
To clarify I think the raft should be crafted in 2x3 of bamboo not bamboo wood as it is made of now
^That doesn't make as much sense, since the raft is made with the new textures of the dried bamboo planks.
This would be nice because I spend over 10 hours searching in ocean runes for the armor trim and I am still look for just one
thats because there aren't armour trims in ocean ruins. there in ocean monuments.
This is a terrible idea the same with the villagers I really do not like it because it will change so much all at once and It will take a convenient way of doing things and make it unnecessary harder

Heres an idea: What if the piglin trades were like enchanting tables, and you can choose three options with the third having a better chance at giving you good items but costing 3 gold. maybe its like level 1 = string gravel etc, level 2 = crying obsidian soul sand etc, and level 3 being all the level two trades with nerfed chances and then also obsidian and enderpearls and stuff with a normal odds, they would just be rarer bc of all the level two trades included as well. then speedrunners would HAVE to do level 1 trades as well as level 3 trades. and there can be a cooldown where the piglin admires the gold (for the texture just show three slightly overlapped gold/level three if thats a problem) and its set up like villager trades where you put the gold into the slot, but you dont know what you're going to get. you could also change the format for enchanting tables if thats worries you. but thats my thoughths

This wouldn't work the same because each villager carries the biome it's from anyways but piglins are just... there
Plus, there's only 5 biomes, 3 of which piglins don't spawn in and even bastions can't generate in basalt deltas. You're probably not supposed to make a connection to these guys in the same way you would with villagers.
Interesting idea though
